mapper.select: SELECT a.course_name train,a.start_time,a.end_time, c.cname, b.* from TRAINING_ROOM_ORDER a INNER JOIN train_course b on a.course_id=b.id left join COURSE_TYPE c on a.course_type=c.id where b.apply_method=0 and b.apply_start_time<=#{applyStartTime} and b.apply_end_time>=#{applyStartTime} ORDER BY b.id, a.start_time

SELECT d.apply_time,d.`status` apply_status,a.course_name train,a.start_time,a.end_time, c.cname, b.* from user_course_apply d INNER JOIN train_course b on d.course_id=b.id INNER JOIN TRAINING_ROOM_ORDER a on a.course_id=b.id left join COURSE_TYPE c on a.course_type=c.id where b.apply_method=0 and d.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY b.id, a.start_time
mapper.update: update train_course set remain_apply_quota=remain_apply_quota-1 where id=#{id}
